typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TransactionId as string,
		CustomerId as integer,
		ProductId as short,
		Quantity as byte,
		Price as decimal(38,18),
		TotalAmount as decimal(38,18),
		TransactionDate as integer,
		ProfitAmount as decimal(38,18),
		Hour as byte,
		Minute as byte,
		StoreId as short,
		Year as string,
		Quarter as string,
		Month as string,
		Day as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['sale-small/Year=2018/*/*/*/*','sale-small/Year=2019/*/*/*/*']) ~> salesdata
salesdata sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		TransactionId,
		CustomerId,
		ProductId,
		Quantity,
		Price,
		TotalAmount,
		TransactionDate,
		ProfitAmount,
		Hour,
		Minute,
		StoreId,
		Year,
		Quarter,
		Month,
		Day
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sale
